title.narrative: Promoting the commercialisation of abandoned mine methane (AMM) recovery in China

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw on UK expertise to produce a policy framework for an abandoned mine methane commercial pilot, which will be shared with key policy makers and stakeholders in China (including coal companies). The project will bring together UK and Chinese companies, enabling further pilots in China, and the potential for commercial opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.
